text.__SUMMARY__: Tillandsia sceptriformis is a species of plant in the family Bromeliaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador.  Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: Manzanares, J.M. & Pitman, N. (2003). "Tillandsia sceptriformis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2003: e.T43348A10798844. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2003.RLTS.T43348A10798844.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
